name: Blessings Life Foundation Trust

address: Jacob Memorial Community college campus,OPP.Kalmadam,Balmore Road,

briefDescription: Aim / Goal:The ultimate goal of this Organization is to enlighten the poor in their life situation. It aims to help neglected and deprived rural and urban people including the tribal’s who live in remote villages of India. The inhabitants of these villages are underprivileged and illiterates. Vision:The vision of this Organization is to transform these people to bring them on par with others. The vision is implemented gradually through various programme.  Mission:To identify socially deprived people work along with the economy and enable them to be self- reliant and enjoy a healthy, dignified and “Sustainable Quality of Life” Head of the  Programmes implemented in our Organization:1.	Livelihood Welfare and Research Programme.2.	Health Welfare and Research Programme.3.	Education Welfare and Research Programme.4.	Environment welfare and Research Programme.
